data.title: Cunninghame Graham, Robert Bontine, 1852-1936
data.text:
Abstract

Robert Bontine Cunningham Graham (1852-1936), Scottish politician, writer, journalist and adventurer. The collection contains correspondence with various personal friends and literary associates containing discussions of Scottish politics in the late 19th and early 20th centuries, as well as essays and speechesa and the handwritten manuscript and typescript of his biography of Francesco Solano Lopez.

Abstract

Letters to Walter (Klinefelter?) sending a photograph and letters to publishers, Heinamann & Co. instructs that copies of his works be sent to various recipients. Includes holograph ms. on verso of printed holiday greeting and illustration of “Don Roberto” .
